name: POSITIVE CHIC
text: Customer service was great but the quality of the pizza was awful. The pan pizza I had taste absolutely nothing like the pizza huts delicious crunchy baked bottom moist and flavorful dough and toppings. We were very disappointed and will not be ordering Pizza Hut again anytime soon.

name: Holy Skiba
text:
On and off relationship with this joint. Sometimes the pizzas really bad, sometimes the pizzas really good, or in between. Lately, there's been some improvements, though. I suggest giving them another chance.
Got an amazing extra cheese pizza during a deal.
